import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ProductCarousel from './ProductCarousel' import './ProductDetails.css' function ProductDetails({list}) { let {id} = useParams() return (
{list.filter(item => item.id == id).map(filterItem => ( <>

{filterItem.title}

$ {filterItem.price}
{ Array(filterItem.rating) .fill() .map((_) => ) }
))}
) } export default ProductDetails
